SEARCH

Uses of Package
acdp.design

Packages that use acdp.design
Package
Description
acdp
Contains the core interfaces needed to operate a database.
acdp.design
Contains classes for designing an ACDP database.
acdp.tools
Contains tools for database administration purposes, including the Setup tool for creating the backing files of a database from a custom database class and the Refactor class that provides methods for refactoring a database.
acdp.types
Contains the built-in column types as well as the super interface of all column types, the Type interface.
  • Classes in acdp.design used by acdp
    Class
    Description
    ICipherFactory
    Declares methods used to encrypt and decrypt data in a database.
  • Classes in acdp.design used by acdp.design
    Class
    Description
    CustomDatabase
    Defines the super class of a custom database class.
    CustomTable
    Defines the super class of a custom table class.
    ICipherFactory
    Declares methods used to encrypt and decrypt data in a database.
    SimpleType
    The super class of all non-array custom and built-in column types with the exception of the built-in reference column type.
    ST.Nulls
    Defines the constants used to indicate whether a column allows for the null value or not.
    ST.OutrowStringLength
    Defines the constants used to indicate the maximum number of characters of an outrow string.
  • Classes in acdp.design used by acdp.tools
    Class
    Description
    CustomTable
    Defines the super class of a custom table class.
    ICipherFactory
    Declares methods used to encrypt and decrypt data in a database.
  • Classes in acdp.design used by acdp.types
    Class
    Description
    SimpleType
    The super class of all non-array custom and built-in column types with the exception of the built-in reference column type.
